text:
Another one under "Clone a Landing Page" in <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/pages>
For Node, the proposed call is:   `const apiResponse = await HubSpotClient.cms.pages.sitePages.landingPagesApi.clone(ContentCloneRequestVNext);`
But this should be   `const apiResponse = await HubSpotClient.cms.pages.landingPagesApi.clone(ContentCloneRequestVNext);`
As sitePages does not contain landingPagesApi, in the v11 client at least.

The endpoint definition here:
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/files/files>
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/media-bridge/> 
is not consistent. Sometimes it's a name/definition, sometimes its the API "path". The "Blog authors" is just for comparison how most definitions I've found look like(imo better).
